TopicTitle: Lava Trick. 6000' Under, take 2: Cyborg Bath edition. Ã‚Â¡Bungie, lavame por favor!

Articles.Content:
Rampancy Team missed too much in its play through of Bungie's Marathon 2 level "6,000 Feet Under", so Narcogen tackles it again solo; this time skipping most of what was covered before and concentrating on a useful lava trick to take out the plentiful Cyborgs.

Movie link:

Get the (now) free game here: http://marathon.sourceforge.net/games/marathon2.php

Its actually number two of the trilogy. Find the trilogy here: http://marathon.sourceforge.net
